General.Name: InBody Co.Ltd
General.Description: InBody Co.,Ltd provides body composition analysis solutions worldwide. The company offers body composition analyzers, blood pressure monitors, stadiometers, and body water analyzers, as well as InBody dial and bands. Its products are used in nephrology, liver disease, diabetes, nutrition, and rehabilitation applications. The company was formerly known as Biospace Co., Ltd. InBody Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
